name: commiter-ai-generator
description: Effortlessly generate smart commit messages with AI, powered by OpenRouter. Streamline your workflow and maintain a clean commit history.

commiter_ai.api_key.title: API Key
commiter_ai.api_key.markdownDescription:
**Required:**
Obtain your API key from [OpenRouter.ai](https://openrouter.ai/keys). Navigate to 'Keys' > 'Create New Key', copy and paste here.

**Security Note:** Keep this private - never commit it publicly!

commiter_ai.prompt.max_tokens.title: Max Tokens
commiter_ai.prompt.max_tokens.markdownDescription:
**Response Length**
Controls maximum text units (tokens) in generated commit messages:
- Lower values produce concise messages
- Higher values allow detailed explanations

Refer to model limits: [Supported Models](https://openrouter.ai/models)

commiter_ai.prompt.custom_prompt.title: Custom Prompt
commiter_ai.prompt.custom_prompt.markdownDescription:
**Custom Instructions**
Override default behavior with specific guidelines. Example:

`Generate concise commits that:
- Start with emoji
- Reference JIRA tickets
- Use present tense`

Leave empty to use default settings

commiter_ai.prompt.temperature.title: Creativity
commiter_ai.prompt.temperature.markdownDescription:
**Creativity**
- 0.0: Predictable output
- 0.7: Balanced (recommended)
- 2.0: Experimental

Lower values follow strict conventions

commiter_ai.prompt.model.title: AI Model
commiter_ai.prompt.model.markdownDescription:
**AI Model Selection**
Choose from [OpenRouter models](https://openrouter.ai/models). Consider:
- Cost per token
- Context window size
- Response speed

commiter_ai.prompt.commit_style.title: Commit Style
enumDescriptions:
**Conventional Commits**
`feat: add login validation`
Structured format for automated changelogs

**Linus Style**
`Login System

- Implement OAuth2 flow
- Add error handling`
Title followed by detailed body

**Imperative Mood**
`Implement password strength check`
Verb-first, present tense

**Simple Prefix**
`fix: header alignment issue`
Category with brief description

**Ticket Reference**
`PROJ-123: Add user dashboard`
Links to task tracking systems

**Symbol Notation**
`[+] Enable dark mode toggle`
Visual change indicators

**Concise**
`Optimize image loading`
Brief summary without formatting
commiter_ai.prompt.commit_style.markdownDescription: Select a predefined commit message style or format.
